title: Classic FPS Collection Ver. 4
description:
This is the repaired version of the CfC.
_____________________________________________

The Classic FPS collection is a work of love. The main idea was to have the ability to pop a USB thumb Drive into any PC and to be able to play Classic Goodness anywhere with a nice frontend. Unfortunately M$ turned off autoload from USB which makes my original dream impossible (as far as i know). None of these games are my original works and credit goes to those who work long and hard to get these great games running where we could play them. I did make the frontend and Custom art for the buttons. I have spent a lot of time in getting this to run but it does not mean that it is perfect as of yet. Some games may still crash or some of the expansion may not load properly. If you need to change settings you can dig into the folders ( DATA AutoPlay Docs GOG ) my origination is lacking but all the files are there if you dig. Each game has a EXE or BAT in their main folders that will launch the games from there. You can run this from anywhere but of course it was designed for a USB Thumb drive. It can be started from the DATA folder by running the autorun.exe. do not alter the file structure or some games WILL NOT work properly. Please feel free to let me know in the comments and I'll try and fix them.

**note** if Half-life (including Blue shift and oppssing force) ask for a key      just put in AAAAA-AAAAA-AAAAA-AAAAA-AAAAA to get it to load.

**note** to get mouse look to work in System SHock press the E key.

**note** since these are old games some of them have issues with full screen. you can Alt-ENTER or change your resolution to fix it.

**note** start the Quake II Expansions in windowed mode because they have issue loading sometimes otherwise.
